articles.title: India-Russia trade imbalance: Moscow's Rupee trap is adding to $147 billion hoard abroad - The Economic Times
articles.description: Russia has emerged as a top supplier of oil to India over the past year, settling a greater share of trade in national currencies and redirecting shipments east as traditional customers in Europe shunned purchases after the war began over a year ago.
